column5: Who is going out to begin shopping today?   I might hit Square One, It shouldn't be too busy should it?  I might loaf around until noon to get some good relax time in before I go.    Good luck to all the guys that are like me today.
You'll be fine, everybody else is finished their shopping already so you should have the mall all to yourself today
I always save one gift for last.I wouldn't miss the chance to see the looks on the faces of all the panicking guys searching for that last gift.
Let me know where you are shopping so i can go watch

I'll be doing the rest of mine between now and 2pm and then back to the hospital for the night. The malls have been empty all week. I parked at the doors on Wednesday at BPS.. as well as Upper Canada Mall in Newmarket and the Georgian Mall in Barrie. Only parking lot that is hard to get a spot in is the LCBO !
Why when is Christmas, is it soon?
My brother called me today. "what do you want for christmas? I'm doing my shopping today"  haha, holiday tradition for him...so funny.

Back when I was single and just out of school, my best buddy and I would wait until the last shopping day before Christmas. We'd start at 7:00 am with a breakfast at som  rsturaunt and then hit every mall we could that day. Oftem the fitst gify didn't get bought until about 4:00 pm. Then the panic would start. What a roit. We had a blast Christmas shopping. We did that for about 20 years until we both got married and had a family. Miss the old days.  Now I start my Christmas shopping in July and look all year for those special gifts.  It's just not the same.   muddler
Done.  Nothing to it.  I rule :-)
My girlfriend did all the shopping. I just had to get her a gift. Went to Tiffany's spent a lot. I should be good.
Well the shopping didn't happen... but I brought home the most important package tonight a 8:45.. Jennifer!
Well done.  Glad to hear it.   Merry Christmas.
Pretty sure Leah is good with that Brian.. and I can shop next week !! (things will be cheaper!!! LOL)
